name: Mighty John and the Thunder Giant
name_original: Mighty John and the Thunder Giant
description:
⚡⚡⚡

Fight the Thunder Giant!

Avoid attacks, take bonus and shoot bullets! 

Controls:
  • arrow keys to move 
  • space bar to shoot

A game made for the Trijam #139. The theme was "Boss Fights".
Hope you like it!

A small tribute for the amazing CupHead by Studio MDHR <3

Credits :

Music : Rimsky-Korsakov - Flight of the Bumblebee

⚡⚡⚡
